member.name: M:UBS.ReportManager.Api.Controllers.ReportController.GetAllReports(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns all reports in the system that are active (not deleted). Optionally query parameter 'includeDeleted' can be specified to true if deleted reports need to be included
member.param: if 'true' then all report records will be returned

member.name: M:UBS.ReportManager.Api.Controllers.ReportController.GetReport(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns information on a report identified by given id. Optionally query parameter 'includeDeleted' can be specified to true if deleted reports need to be included
member.param: if 'true' then a deleted report will be returned
member.returns: Report Information, an instance of Report

member.name: M:UBS.ReportManager.Api.Controllers.ReportController.AddReports(System.Collections.Generic.List{UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.Report})
member.summary: Adds one or more report. In case the input contains a duplicate, none of the reports will be added and 400 will be returned with explanatory error message
member.returns: Returns added reports, or error message

member.name: M:UBS.ReportManager.Api.Controllers.ReportController.UpdateReport(System.Collections.Generic.List{UBS.ReportManager.Abstractions.Model.Domain.Report})
member.param: Updated information on one or more reports

member.name: M:UBS.ReportManager.Api.Controllers.ReportController.DeleteReport(System.String)
member.summary: Soft-Deletes an existing report identified by the given code. If the report is already deleted, then no action is taken
member.param: Identifier of the report to be deleted

member.name: M:UBS.ReportManager.Api.Controllers.ReportController.GenerateReport(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a report file using the template specified by the report identified with id
member.param: Identifier of the report for which report file needs to be generated
